description: This Java class represents a service layer for managing notes, including methods for creating, listing, retrieving by ID, updating, and deleting notes. It interacts with a repository layer for database operations and handles business logic related to notes.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: Service class providing business logic for note management, including create, read, update, delete, and list operations.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note using the provided NoteRequest and returns a NoteResponse.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves a paginated list of notes, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a note by its ID, throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with data from NoteRequest.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID, throws NotFoundException if the note does not exist.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a Note entity to a NoteResponse DTO.
